data.title: Sam Baydoun (Dist. 13)
data.text:
Wayne County Commissioners declare April as Arab American Heritage Month

Wayne County Commissioners have again declared April as Arab American Heritage Month, honoring the many contributions of Arab American residents make in improving the lives of all county residents.

Wayne County Commission calls for tighter restrictions on fireworks

With the July 4 holiday now past - but Labor Day and other holidays approaching - Wayne County Commissioners have called on state officials to return to past restrictions limiting fireworks use.

Commission calls on feds to recognize Middle Eastern, North African ethnicity

Wayne County Commissioners have called on the federal government to begin recognizing Middle Eastern and North African (MENA) as a specific racial and ethnic identity.

Wayne County Commission recognizes Ramadan

Wayne County Commissioners today unanimously approved a resolution by Commissioners Sam Baydoun (D-Dearborn) and Al Haidous (D-Wayne) recognizing Ramadan, the Muslim holy month which this year begins March 23 and lasts to April 20.

Alisha Bell unanimously re-elected as Wayne County Commission Chair

Alisha Bell was unanimously re-elected as Wayne County Commission chair on Jan. 5, with Joseph Palamara unanimously re-elected vice-chair and Sam Baydoun unanimously re-elected chair pro-tem for the 2023-24 commission session.

Wayne County Commission seeks new legislation to stop school shootings

Wayne County Commissioners have called on state and federal lawmakers to take action in the wake of Tuesday's shootings at Oxford High School, which left four students dead and four other individuals wounded.

Commissioners remember former representative Plawicki

Wayne County Commissioners Joseph Palamara, David Knezek, Sam Baydoun and Judge Mark Plawicki all took part in dedication ceremonies for a section of Telegraph Road honoring the late Michigan Rep. Julie Plawicki.

Wayne County Commissioners declare April as Arab American Heritage Month

Wayne County Commissioners today unanimously approved a resolution by Commissioners Sam Baydoun (D-Dearborn) and Al Haidous (D-Wayne) recognizing April as Arab American Heritage Month.

Alisha Bell re-elected as Wayne County Commission Chair, other officers also chosen

Wayne County Commissioner Alisha Bell (D-Detroit) was unanimously re-elected as commission Chair on Thursday during the board organizational meeting for 2021-22. Joseph Palamara was elected vice-chair and Sam Baydoun vice-chair pro tem.

Commissioner Sam Baydoun holds COVID-19 town hall

Gov. Gretchen Whitmer, Rep. Debbie Dingell among those participating in video event available on Facebook.

Commissioner Sam Baydoun's newsletter for summer 2020

Newsletter for District 13

Wayne County Commission calls for national action, dialogue on police brutality

Prompted by the death of George Floyd, the Wayne County Commission on June 4 adopted a resolution condemning police brutality and calling on national elected officials to draft a bipartisan response to the issue as well as its root causes.

Wayne County Commissioners remember mass shooting victims, condemn violence and hate speech

Wayne County Commissioners on Aug. 8 paused for a moment of silence to remember victims of the mass shootings in Dayton, Ohio, El Paso, Texas and Gilroy, California.

Commissioners tour port authority dock

Commissioners Glenn S. Anderson, Sam Baydoun, Monique Baker McCormick and Al Haidous, along with commission staff, toured the Detroit/Wayne County Port Authority dock in southwest Detroit on June 17.

Wayne County Commission honors start of Ramadan

Imam Ibrahim Kazerooni of the Islamic Center of America offered the invocation at the May 2 meeting of the Wayne County Commission as the commission observed the beginning of Ramadan.

Commissioner Baydoun offers congratulations on special airport luncheon

On Jan. 25, members of the Muslim American community, local elected officials and Transportation Security Administration and Department of Homeland Security employees broke bread together at Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport.
